channel.title: Help please, having issues with no-ip server connection
channel.description:
QUOTES FROM LAST POST...
Shadow742000 Member
Rep: 10 Online
help needed, confused ip address, client.java « on: Today at 03:07:17 PM »QuoteModifyRemove --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
when i press crtl+f and search server =... i find the area im supposed to put a website and a ip address in, but i dont know what im supposed to put in... i have a no-ip host created. but im confused how im supposed to make it work, please help. Report to moderator 71.238.180.72 .+tyco+ Member
Rep: 13 [Rep++] [Rep--] Offline
Re: help needed, confused ip address, client.java « Reply #1 on: Today at 03:19:07 PM »Quote --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 Report to moderator Logged http://i.imgur.com/GJYeI.jpg.Shadow742000 Member
Rep: 10 Online
Re: help needed, confused ip address, client.java « Reply #2 on: Today at 03:20:25 PM »QuoteModifyRemove --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Quote from: +tyco+ on Today at 03:19:07 PM 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0
hey jackass, i dont want to play offline, im trying to make a fucking server Report to moderator 71.238.180.72 .JavaTC Senior Member
Rep: 15 [Rep++] [Rep--] Offline
Re: help needed, confused ip address, client.java « Reply #3 on: Today at 03:24:57 PM »Quote --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Basically you put the no-ip host you created in ex.
Code: [Select]yourserver.no-ip.org You also have to ensure that in no-ip that the host your using is checked.Report to moderator Logged Respected
Quote C++ Imbued, imsuperman05, Uncalled, tinyscape, Squirt Ltd
.Shadow742000 Member
Rep: 10 Online
Re: help needed, confused ip address, client.java « Reply #4 on: Today at 03:33:17 PM »QuoteModifyRemove --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
i downloaded no-ip's program and it says my server is already checked now tell me how i connect my no-ip-server to my rspsclient and source-server

item.title: Help please, having issues with no-ip server connection
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

you arent making sense. what website address am i supposed to put in my no-ip one, cause i put it in there, compiled and it always says “invalid address” or something like that…

Read full topic

item.title: Help please, having issues with no-ip server connection
item.dc:creator: @Jean_Valjean Jean Valjean
item.description:
@Jean_Valjean wrote:

You put in were it said server = yourname.no-ip.biz or what ever you use for biz like org or something.

Read full topic
